TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SynchronizedReadOnlyCollection`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IList`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public Class SynchronizedReadOnlyCollection(Of T) Implements ICollection(Of T), IEnumerable(Of T), IList, IList(Of T)

generic <typename T> public ref class SynchronizedReadOnlyCollection : System::Collections::Generic::ICollection<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IList<T>, System::Collections::IList

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 包含在线程安全只读集合中作为项的对象的类型。

span.span: The type of object contained as items in the thread-safe, read-only collection.

summary.span: 提供一个线程安全只读集合，该集合包含泛型参数所指定的类型的对象作为元素。

span.span: Provides a thread-safe, read-only collection that contains objects of a type specified by the generic parameter as elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将数据存储在 容器中，它提供一个对象，该对象可进行设置，可用于同步对集合的访问，以使其成为线程安全集合。The stores data in an container and provides an object that can be set and used to synchronize access to the collection so that it is thread safe. 使用 属性可以恢复 容器。The container can be recovered using the property. 使用 属性可以恢复同步对象。The synchronized object can be recovered using the property. 只能通过采用 `syncRoot` 参数的构造函数之一对其进行设置。It can only be set using one of the constructors that take the `syncRoot` parameter.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object syncRoot) cil managed
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object sync_root) cil managed

summary.span: 使用对线程安全只读集合的访问进行同步的对象，初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the object used to synchronize access to the thread-safe, read-only collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用相同 创建 `syncRoot` 的多个实例，则所有实例之间的访问都是受保护的。If multiple instances of the are created using the same `syncRoot`, then access is protected across all instances.
